name: Tagaytay with a twist of faith!
description: Tagaytay - Second highest habitable location in the Philippines. With a climate cooler then most cities around. An environment so green so beautiful and with aromas of all kinds. Organic fruits and veggies roam the city farm high up in the mountain. This city is the city to travel if you prefer hiking, walking, getting a little breeze. A city with compared to no other when it comes to be clean and tranquil. Site seeing is the big deal here as well as the taal volcanoes hike, skyeye at the skyranch, sonyas garden, puzzle house mansion, picnic grove, peoples park (palace in the sky). This is the place to do fine dining. splendid home cooked meals of the Filipino tradition.
